name: garden
about: You are standing in a sunny, Japanese garden

actions.relax: You lie down on the grass. Feels great!

name: tree
about: a very tall, lovely, Japanese plum blossom tree

actions.hug: You give the tree a long hug.

actions.eat: You'd rather not. It looks weird.

name: beach
about: You are on a beautiful, white beach

name: manual
about: It's a book on AI programming in Python, written by a bot

read: <on read 0><set read 1>As you read the Python manual your mind starts to drift. You see a vision of 100-foot robots fighting, smashing down buildings as they grapple. Your vision fades.

name: cave
about: You are in The Cave of Darkness. It's very dark in here! You hear a sound.

actions.listen: You hear a series of musical beeps, as if being played by an old IBM computer.

name: clue
about: It's a little clue written on a yellow post-it note

actions.read: It says: "You have a very big pocket."
